plot: Dan protests his innocence but Steve remains convinced that he is responsible for the damaged car. Tina and Gail welcome David home from prison. Eileen orders Jason to let Becky down gently.
title: "Coronation Street" Episode #1.6831
plot_es: Dan protests his innocence but Steve remains convinced that he is responsible for the damaged car. Tina and Gail welcome David home from prison. Eileen orders Jason to let Becky down gently.
